input: What film has screen adaptation stars Meryl Streep as Miranda Priestly, a powerful fashion magazine editor, and Anne Hathaway as Andrea, that also used the soundtrack of the second single from British funk/acid jazz band Jamiroquai's sixth studio album, "Dynamite"?
